comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henri_La_Fontaine Henri La Fontaine, (22 April 1854 – 14 May 1943) was a Belgian international lawyer and president of the International Peace Bureau from 1907 to 1943 who received the Nobel Prize for Peace in 1913.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for providing his full name here.  We'll include it next time we update.
